titleStmt.title: By the Generall Assembly of the Confederate Catholiqves of Ireland whereas divers ill affected to the government of this kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: Confederate Catholics.
Blake, Richard, Sir, d. 1663.
Kearney, Phillip.

publicationStmt.publisher: By command of the Generall Assembly,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Kilkenny, the foureteenth day of September Anno Domini 1648 ... Richard Blake, Prol. Gen. Conv. ; Phill. Kearney Cler. Gen. Conv."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
